name: Hawaiian Shirt
description:
## Hawaiian Shirt

A must have for Bumpkins with a laid-back and tropical vibe. Perfect for beach parties.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
